notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.U. conceived and supervised the project. M.K., A.U., D.A. and L.G. devised the methodology. M.K. carried out the computations. M.K. and D.A. carried out formal analysis. M.K., D.A., A.U. and L.G. interpreted the data. P.L. and J.H. provided technical resources. A.U., D.A. and M.K. drafted the article. J.H., P.L. and L.G. offered critical revision of the article text and interpretation of the results. All authors approved the submitted version.
